name: Knight of Truth, Gordon
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, all of the "Blaster Blade" on your (VC) or (RC) get [Power]+5000. If your "Blaster Blade" is in the same column as this unit, this unit gets "Boost".

name: Little Sage, Marron
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other rear-guard is placed in the same column as this unit, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power]+3000 until end of turn.

name: Rectangle Magus
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], look at two cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, and draw a card.
[AUTO](RC):When your drive check reveals a trigger unit, this unit gets [Power]+5000 until end of turn.

name: Miko of Elegance, Fumino
effect: [AUTO](VC)/(RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it on the top of your deck, shuffle the rest of the cards and put them on the bottom of your deck, and this unit gets [Power]+2000 until end of turn.

name: Crimson Impact, Metatron
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When ridden from a grade 3, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], call a card from your damage zone to (RC), and this unit gets [Power]+15000 until end of turn.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Put a card from your damage zone on the bottom of your deck], and deal this unit one damage. (Perform a damage check)

name: Underlay Celestial, Hesediel
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast1], and swap a unit card from your hand with a card from your damage zone. (Put it face up)

name: Black-winged Swordbreaker
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and if this unit was placed from hand, this unit gets [Power]+5000 until end of turn.

name: Skull Witch, Nemain
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Rest] this unit], search your deck for up to one [Power] 5000 card, call it to an open (RC), and shuffle your deck. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Player of the Holy Bow, Viviane
effect: [AUTO](VC)/(RC):When placed from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], look at three cards from the top of your deck, call a card from among them to (RC), put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order, and this unit gets [Power]+3000 until end of turn.

name: Listener of Truth, Dindrane
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed by your card's ability, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and "Draw a card." or "[Counter-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power]+3000 until end of turn.".

name: Battle Maiden, Sahohime
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Charge 1 & Soul-Blast 2], draw two cards, put a card from your hand into your soul, and increase this unit's [Power] by the [Shield] of the card put into your soul until end of turn.

name: Witch of Cats, Cumin
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Rest] this unit], and return one of your [Stand] rear-guards to your hand, or put a card from your drop zone into your soul.

name: Flame of Hope, Aermo
effect:
[CONT](RC):During the battle that it boosted, this unit gets [Power]+3000.
[AUTO](RC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your turn, [COST][retire this unit], draw a card, and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Sabel Dragonewt
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When its attack hits, draw a card.
[AUTO](RC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your turn, [COST][retire this unit], and draw a card.

effect:
[AUTO](VC)/(RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power]+6000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it attacked [COST][put this unit into your soul], and return one of your rear-guards to your hand.

name: Stealth Dragon, Togajuji
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your grade 3 unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and your opponent cannot call sentinels from his or her hand until end of that battle.

name: Ravenous Dragon, Megarex
effect: [AUTO](VC)/(RC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][retire another rear-guard], and draw a card. If this unit is on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast1], put the top card of your deck face down as an equip gauge for this unit, and it gets [Power]+5000 until end of that battle for each of this unit's equip gauge.

name: Vicious Claw Dragon, Laceraterex
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, put the top card of your deck face down as an equip gauge for this unit.
[AUTO]:When it is retired from (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and return up to one gauge equipped to this unit to your hand.

name: Stealth Rogue of Indignation, Meomaru
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and all of your rear-guards with the same card name as your vanguard get [Power]+5000 until end of turn.

name: Stealth Beast, Million Rat
effect: [ACT](RC):If you do not have another "Stealth Beast, Million Rat" on your (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast1], search your deck for up to one "Stealth Beast, Million Rat", call it to (RC), shuffle your deck, and that unit gets [Power]-4000 until end of turn.

name: Dragonic Deathscythe
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose a rear-guard in your opponent's front row, bind it, and this unit gets [Power]+3000 until end of turn.
[CONT](RC):During the battle it attacked a vanguard, if your opponent does not have a rear-guard in the front row of the same column as this unit, this unit gets [Power]+5000.

name: Rising Phoenix
effect: [AUTO](Drop zone):When your opponent's rear-guard is bound during your turn, you may call this card to (RC). If you do, this unit gets [Power]+3000 until end of turn.

name: Kick Kick Typhoon
effect:
[AUTO](VC)/(RC):When placed, if this unit is on (VC) or an additional (RC), one of your units gets [Power]+5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When it attacks, if all of the (RC) in your front row have rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast1], and [Stand] one of your other rear-guards.

name: Clay-doll Mechanic
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed, if you have a total of four or less cards in your hand and rear-guards, draw a card.
[AUTO](RC):When you [Counter-Blast], [COST][retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Platinum Ace
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power]+5000.
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When it attacks, if your grade 3 or greater vanguard's [Power] is 30000 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power]+10000/[Critical]+1 until end of turn.

effect:
[ACT](VC)/(RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and one of your vanguards gets [Power]+5000 until end of turn.

name: Blast Monk of the Thundering Foot
effect: [AUTO](VC)/(RC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and bind it face down. If you chose a grade 2 or greater card, [Soul-Charge 1].

name: Destiny Dealer
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on (RC) as a locked card.
[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, and put it on (RC) as a locked card. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn)

name: Spike Bouncer
effect:
[AUTO](VC)/(RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], look at the same number of cards from the top of your deck as your vanguard's grade, call up to one card from among them to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Gyro Slinger

name: Emblem Master

name: Doreen the Thruster
effect: [AUTO](VC)/(RC):When your card is put into your soul by your card's ability, this unit gets [Power]+5000 until end of turn. (+10000 if [Soul-Charge 2])

name: Silver Thorn Acrobat, Leonor

name: Quicky Quicky Worker
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, put up to one card from your drop zone on the bottom of your deck. If you put a grade 3 or greater card, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and draw a card.

name: Greed Shade
effect:
